snippet: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka beat ninth-seeded Marion Bartoli, 6-4, 6-2, at the China Open in Beijing to set up a final against Maria Sharapova.
abstract: Victoria Azarenka and Maria Sharapova will meet in women's final at the China Open tennis tournament; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka beat ninth-seeded Marion Bartoli, 6-4, 6-2, at the China Open in Beijing to set up a final against Maria Sharapova.

headline.seo: Victoria Azarenka to Play Sharapova in China Open Final
